titleStmt.title: Ouid his inuectiue against Ibis. Translated into English méeter, whereunto is added by the translator, a short draught of all the stories and tales contayned therein, very pleasant to be read
Ibis. English
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
Underdown, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Translated by Thomas Underdown, whose name appears on A2r.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
